gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.args

Interface Arguments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Args, ArgsDecorator, ConfigFileArg, CreateConfigArg, DateRangeArg, VerboseArg

    public interface Arguments
    Decorator interface for command line arguments.
    Author:
    Tom Parker

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        com.martiansoftware.jsap.Parameter getById(String id)
        Find a parameter given its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for
        Returns:
        The value of the id

      • parse

        com.martiansoftware.jsap.JSAPResult parse(String[] args)
                                   throws ArgumentException
        Parse a command line.
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments provided at program launch
        Returns:
        The parsed arguments
        Throws:
        ArgumentException - if anything goes wrong. Yes, pretty much anything.

      • registerParameter

        void registerParameter(com.martiansoftware.jsap.Parameter parameter)
                throws ArgumentException
        Register a Parameter with JSAP.
        Parameters:
        parameter - The Parameter to register
        Throws:
        ArgumentException - if I cannot register the parameter

      • messagePrinted

        boolean messagePrinted()
        Report whether JSAP displayed a message to the user. Typically means either an error or that the user requested help.
        Returns:
        True if JSAP printed a message while parsing arguments
